author: Staff Reporter
text:
Activists fighting for speedy implementation of Athikadavu-Avinashi Flood Flow Canal Scheme have decided to continue with their fasting till State Government allocates amount towards the project or issue a government order for implementation of the scheme in its full.

The indefinite fast by 14 persons at Avinashi in support of the scheme completed 10 days on Wednesday.

MDMK leader Vaiko visited the activists expressing solidarity to their demands.

M. Velusamy, an activist, pointed out that mere announcements by the government authorities that scheme would be implemented was not enough.
title: Fast to continue for Athikadavu-Avinashi scheme
